title: Covid passports: How do they work around the world?
description: How are countries enforcing vaccine passports and what can people use them for?

title: The repair shop trying to fix throwaway culture
description: A social enterprise has opened up shop in Glasgow to encourage communities to repair and reuse their possessions.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Great Britain beat Canada as Liam Ansell strikes twice
description: Liam Ansell finds the net twice as Great Britain's men make it two wins from two at Tokyo 2020 with victory over Canada.

title: Watch: Coach's celebration as Titmus beats Ledecky
description: Watch the wild celebrations of the coach to Australian swimmer Ariarna Titmus after she wins a thrilling 400m freestyle gold at the Tokyo Olympics.

title: Migrant boats getting bigger, says Home Office
description: Some 378 people crossed the Channel on Sunday, after record numbers made the journey last month.

title: Adam Peaty wins GB's first gold of Tokyo Games
description: Adam Peaty writes his name into the history books once again as he wins 100m breaststroke gold in Tokyo to become the first British swimmer to defend his Olympic title.

title: New Zealand to allow IS-linked mother to be repatriated
description: Permission for a mother and her children to travel was not taken lightly, NZ prime minister says.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Naomi Osaka, Garbine Muguruza, Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova into third round of women's singles
description: Japan's Naomi Osaka cruises into the third round of the Tokyo Olympics women's singles with a 65-minute victory over Viktorija Golubic.

title: The Papers: Cases fall as jabs 'turn tide' and unions fight testing plan
description: A sustained fall in UK cases for the first time out of lockdown is among the stories leading the papers.

title: Adam Peaty: Watch emotional interview with Team GB gold medal winner at Tokyo Olympics
description: Watch Adam Peaty react to wining his second Olympic gold with victory in the 100m breaststroke at Tokyo 2020.

title: Watch: Peaty powers home in 100m breaststroke
description: Watch Adam Peaty create history by becoming the first British swimmer to retain an Olympic title with gold in the 100m breaststroke at Tokyo 2020.

title: Coronavirus infections continue to fall in UK
description: But any rise in cases linked to the 19 July unlocking is unlikely to show up in the daily data just yet.

title: Tunisia PM sacked after violent Covid protests
description: Protesters clashed with police as they demanded the government be dismissed over Covid failings.

title: Flooded London hospitals ask patients to stay away
description: Torrential rain saw severe flooding in homes, roads and tube stations in parts of London on Sunday.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Great Britain beat Canada convincingly in opening rugby sevens match
description: Great Britain's men begin their rugby sevens campaign with a convincing 24-0 win over Canada at the Tokyo Olympics.

title: The repair team preserving an 18th Century home
description: Meet the people who work to keep Dennis Severs' 18th Century house in Spitalfields open.

title: Tokyo Olympics: GB's Alex Yee wins silver in men's triathlon as Kristian Blummenfelt takes gold
description: Great Britain's Alex Yee wins silver in a punishing men's triathlon at the Tokyo Olympics as Kristian Blummenfelt of Norway claims gold.

title: Senior doctors in England to be consulted on NHS pay offer
description: The BMA doctors' union says the 3% pay rise offer for NHS staff in England is "bitterly disappointing".
